name: CNContactFetchRequest
desc: An object that defines the options to use when fetching contacts.

items.name: init(keysToFetch: [CNKeyDescriptor])
items.desc: Creates a fetch request for the specified keys.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate?
items.desc: The predicate to match contacts against.

items.name: var mutableObjects: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to return mutable contacts.

items.name: var unifyResults: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to return linked contacts as unified contacts.

items.name: enum CNContactSortOrder
items.desc: Indicates the sorting order for contacts.

items.name: var keysToFetch: [CNKeyDescriptor]
items.desc: The properties to fetch in the returned contacts.
